Initial skeleton app with agent infrastructure

- Set up Next.js 14 with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and ESLint
- Added Vitest and Playwright for testing
- Created agent infrastructure directories and config files
- Added 5 agent command files \(test-plan, test-build, test-execute, code-review, merge-feature\)
- Created health API endpoint and Button component for testing
- Added CLAUDE.md with project rules and boot sequence

\)")
